headline: GE Vernova (GEV) Is A Big Stock Position In The Trust, Says Jim Cramer
summary: We recently published 11 Stocks on Jim Cramer’s Radar. GE Vernova Inc. (NYSE:GEV) is one of the stocks Jim Cramer recently discussed. Cramer often discusses industrial power generation equipment manufacturer GE Vernova Inc. (NYSE:GEV). He believes the firm is the best stock play when it comes to nuclear power plants. headline: I Always Recommend Chevron (CVX) To Anyone Who Wants An Oil Company, Says JIm Cramer
summary: We recently published 11 Stocks Jim Cramer Talked About. Chevron Corporation (NYSE:CVX) is one of the stocks Jim Cramer recently discussed. While the frequency of Cramer mentioning Chevron Corporation (NYSE:CVX) in his morning appearances has dropped, his faith in the firm’s CEO, Mike Wirth, hasn’t.
